name: ImmunizationEventFundingSource
title: Immunization Event Funding Source
description: This code system supports describing the source of the vaccine actually administered. This may be different than the patient eligbility (e.g. the patient may be eligibile for a publically purchased vaccine but due to inventory issues, vaccine purchased with private funds was actually administered).

concept.definition: The vaccine was purchased with private funds.
The vaccine was purchased with public funds.
